FROM centos:7

# labels
LABEL name="law-py27"
LABEL version="0.0.29"

# workdir
WORKDIR /root

# expose ports
EXPOSE 8082

# basic environment variables
ENV WORKDIR /root
ENV LD_LIBRARY_PATH /usr/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
ENV GFAL_PLUGIN_DIR /usr/lib64/gfal2-plugins
ENV LAW_SANDBOX docker::riga/law:py27

# prepare yum
RUN yum -y update; yum clean all
RUN yum -y install yum-plugin-priorities yum-utils; rm -rf /var/cache/yum yum clean all
RUN yum install -y epel-release; rm -rf /var/cache/yum yum clean all

# basic software
RUN yum -y groupinstall development; yum clean all
RUN yum -y install libffi-devel openssl-devel bzip2-devel json-c-devel curl-devel gcc-c++ which \
    wget nano screen git cmake cmake3; rm -rf /var/cache/yum yum clean all

# python software
RUN yum -y install python-setuptools python-docutils; rm -rf /var/cache/yum yum clean all
RUN easy_install pip

# WLCG software
RUN rpm -Uvh https://repo.opensciencegrid.org/osg/3.4/osg-3.4-el7-release-latest.rpm
RUN yum-config-manager --add-repo http://linuxsoft.cern.ch/cern/centos/7/cern/x86_64
RUN yum -y update; yum clean all
RUN yum -y install CERN-CA-certs osg-ca-certs osg-voms voms-clients; rm -rf /var/cache/yum yum clean all

# gfal2
RUN yum -y install gfal2-all gfal2-devel gfal2-util gfal2-python; rm -rf /var/cache/yum yum clean all
RUN git clone https://github.com/cern-it-sdc-id/gfal2-dropbox.git && \
    cd gfal2-dropbox && \
    mkdir build && \
    cd build && \
    cmake .. -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr && \
    make && \
    make install && \
    cd ../.. \
    && rm -rf gfal2-dropbox

# micro editor
RUN cd /usr/bin; curl -f https://getmic.ro | bash

# python packages
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir six
# use luigi 2.7.6, as 2.7.7 dropped support for python version < 2.7.9 (centos 7 comes with 2.7.5)
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir luigi==2.7.6

# install law master
RUN git clone https://github.com/riga/law && \
    cd law && \
    python setup.py install && \
    cd .. && \
    rm -rf law

# shell initialization
RUN echo 'source "$( law completion )"' >> /root/.bash_profile

# init command
CMD bash --login
